ğŸ“¦ PACKAGE CONTENTS

Core Application:
  â€¢ VNC_Manager.exe                (89 KB)   - Compiled executable
  â€¢ VNC_Manager.ps1                (64 KB)   - PowerShell source code
  â€¢ Launch_VNC_Manager.bat         (97 B)    - Quick launcher

Utilities:
  â€¢ scan_devices.bat               (1.1 KB)  - Device detection tool

Dependencies:
  â€¢ lib/                           (54 files) - libimobiledevice binaries
    - idevice_id.exe
    - ideviceinfo.exe
    - idevicepair.exe
    - iproxy.exe
    - Supporting DLLs

  â€¢ device_config.template.ini     (324 B)   - Configuration template

Documentation:
  â€¢ README.md                      (394 lines) - Complete user guide
  â€¢ FIRST_RUN.txt                  (112 lines) - Quick start guide
  â€¢ viewers/README_VIEWERS.txt     - VNC viewer download instructions
  â€¢ DISTRIBUTION_INFO.txt          - This file

â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

âœ¨ KEY FEATURES

âœ“ First-Run Wizard
  - Automatic device detection via idevice_id
  - Interactive setup with smart defaults
  - No manual configuration required

âœ“ Device Detection
  - Scans for connected iOS devices
  - Extracts UDIDs automatically
  - Supports up to 2 devices simultaneously

âœ“ No User Data Included
  - Template config with placeholder values
  - Privacy-safe distribution
  - Clean slate for each user

âœ“ Auto-Reconnect System
  - Supervisor pattern for connection monitoring
  - Exponential backoff retry logic
  - Persistent across sessions

âœ“ Dual Viewer Support
  - TightVNC (recommended, open source)
  - RealVNC (alternative)
  - Runtime viewer switching

âœ“ Quality Presets
  - 5 quality levels (Ultra to Minimal)
  - Optimized for different network conditions
  - Customizable compression settings

â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

ğŸš€ QUICK START FOR END USERS

1. Extract this entire folder to any location
2. Install iTunes or Apple Devices app (for USB drivers)
3. Install TightVNC or RealVNC Viewer
4. Connect iOS device via USB
5. Double-click VNC_Manager.exe
6. Follow the first-run wizard (30 seconds)
7. Press [1] to connect!

Full instructions: See README.md

â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

ğŸ“œ REQUIREMENTS

Essential:
  â€¢ Windows 10 or 11 (64-bit)
  â€¢ PowerShell 5.1+ (included in Windows)
  â€¢ iTunes or Apple Devices app (iOS USB drivers)
  â€¢ Jailbroken iOS device with VNC server

VNC Viewer (choose one):
  â€¢ TightVNC - https://www.tightvnc.com/download.php
  â€¢ RealVNC - https://www.realvnc.com/en/connect/download/viewer/

â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

ğŸ›¡ï¸ LICENSING

  - Provided as-is for personal use

TightVNC & RealVNC:
  - Not included - must be installed separately
  - See viewers/README_VIEWERS.txt for download links
